int
a[177]={1,2,3,4,6,8,9,10,12,16,18,20,24,30,32,36,40,48,60,64,72,80,84,90,96,100,108,120,128,144,160,168,180,192,200,216,224,240,256,288,320,336,360,384,400,432,448,480,504,512,576,600,640,672,720,768,800,864,896,960,1008,1024,1152,1200,1280,1344,1440,1536,1600,1680,1728,1792,1920,2016,2048,2304,2400,2688,2880,3072,3360,3456,3584,3600,3840,4032,4096,4320,4608,4800,5040,5376,5760,6144,6720,6912,7168,7200,7680,8064,8192,8640,9216,10080,10368,10752,11520,12288,12960,13440,13824,14336,14400,15360,16128,16384,17280,18432,20160,20736,21504,23040,24576,25920,26880,27648,28672,28800,30720,32256,32768,34560,36864,40320,41472,43008,46080,48384,49152,51840,53760,55296,57600,61440,62208,64512,65536,69120,73728,80640,82944,86016,92160,96768,98304,103680,107520,110592,115200,122880,124416,129024,131072,138240,147456,153600,161280};
char value[168][100] = int main()
{
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		int i;
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<167;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>n)
			{
				printf("win %s\n",value[i]);
				break;
			}	
		}
		if(i==167)
			printf("lose\n");
	}
}
